ygData.messageBody:
Well they are designed to be armor you gain from levels 25-40.
(assuming 25-40 is "mid-level") If you finished at 34 then
you had "easy" quests. I personally looted from others kills
the following items, any bard with invis song could get these items:

Mudwater Rune from Cazic
Opalline Helm from Oasis
Shin Gauntlets from Lguk
Shin Greaves from Lguk
Icy Greaves from Perma (semi-risky, ... not really)
2 Runes from the One-Eyes in WK
Lute in Mistmoore
... and more.

I was overjoyed my quests were this easy at first...then it kinda
hit me that i was a blueboy at level 25, and would be wearing mostly
the same stuff until the 40s.

I think the armor quests were designed to make us go to unexplored
parts of the world, but the bard quests just seemed to be on a lot of
the monsters that were already killed, sometimes killed a lot.


>
> From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
> I agree with Kitasi here. I don't think our quests are all *that* easy. I
> started doing them at around level 27 and I can assure you that I didn't
> find most of them trivial. My set wasn't complete until about 34th. Sure,
> some pieces are easier than others, but even if you're simply looting quest
> items from other people's kills, it's still pretty risky. The Dark Bone
> bracelet from the basement of Unrest, the Basalt Carapace from well inside
> Lower Guk, the Gypsy Lute from the heart of Castle Mistmoore, the Icy
> Greaves from the King Room in Permafrost, these are not easy things to get
> for a lower level bard even if you're scavanging other's kills.
>
> Crier Sharpsong, 41st bard on Fennin Ro
>
> > From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
> >
> > The bard quests may be easy at 30th level, but I have not found them
> > particularly easy at 20ish. On the other hand I completed my
> > fourth shaman
> > piece last week with my 21st level bard, and I did all the
> > required killing
> > myself for 3 of the pieces. I've also done 3 crafted quests,
> > including the
> > slaying required, and 1 ranger piece. I'm halfway thru about 5
> > bard pieces.
> > If you think our quests are easy try some of the others, they
> > make ours look
> > many levels off for me.
> >
> > I have had no luck getting the icy greaves despite trying four times now.
> > I've spent about 6 hours in the king room with no luck. I know
> > others have
> > been more fortunate on this note, but since the critters involved
> > are still
> > far beyond my means for almost all the bard quests, while the critters for
> > some of the other classes' quests are not, I don't believe ours
> > are as weak
> > as people seem to think. Our quests are relatively easy for the level
> > Verant seems to think should be doing the quests (30-35). Other
> > classes can
> > get some pieces 10 levels before this easily although some of their pieces
> > may be fairly difficult.
